name: RobOut
description:
RobOut was a game developed by the research group GRAFHO for the  Wonderjam4. It's a puzzle game where you can use the scientist and his best weapon and friend Robot to escape the lab from the tecnology who is seeking them. With a friendly gameplay and memorize puzzles to acomplish they objective and get Out the lab.

The theme for this Jam is "One Weapon".

Developers:

Emily Mendes da Hora Andrade (Game Design/Programmer/Music) :  https://emily-mendes.itch.io/

Gabriel Dias Antunes Antonio (Game Design) :  https://gabrieldiasa.itch.io/

Gabriel Henrique Ferreira (Art) :  https://gabrielhferreira.itch.io/

Marcos Gabriel Barreto (Art) : 

https://rizoko.itch.io/

Marcus Vinícius Sabadin (Programmer) : 

https://marcuss375.itch.io/

How to play:

WASD : Move / R: Swap character/ E: Interact/ [1-9] to type password.
